instruction: Design an intuitive user interface for an app that allows users to book tickets
output: The user interface should guide users intuitively through the booking process. It should allow users to select the venue or event, choose a date, select their ticket(s) and enter payment details, with the option to save payment details for future use. The interface should have an easy-to-understand flow, allowing users to immediately see the cost of their ticket and available discounts/offers.
